tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    open_price FLOAT,
    high_price FLOAT,
    low_price FLOAT,
    close_price FLOAT,
    volume BIGINT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  stock_symbol VARCHAR,
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL,
  close_price DECIMAL,
  high_price DECIMAL,
  low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    price_date DATE NOT NULL,
    opening_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_symbols (
    stock_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    stock_id INT REFERENCES stock_symbols(stock_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_data (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume BIGINT,
    PRIMARY KEY (stock_symbol, date)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_metadata (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    exchange VARCHAR(50),
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (stock_symbol)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_exchange (
    exchange_id INT,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (exchange_id)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_industry (
    industry_id INT,
    industry_name VARCHAR(50),
    sector VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (industry_id)
)

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT,
    date DATE,
    open NUMERIC,
    high NUMERIC,
    low NUMERIC,
    close NUMERIC
);

CREATE TABLE AnalystRatings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT,
    target_price NUMERIC,
    rating TEXT,
    analyst_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EarningsReports (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    earnings_per_share NUMERIC,
    revenue NUMERIC
);
